text: Hogrefe Publishing Group (formerly Verlag Hans Huber) is an international company that publishes academic journals and books in the fields of psychology and psychiatry. The first company in the group, Hogrefe Verlag Göttingen, was founded in 1949 by in Göttingen, Germany, where it is still based today. The group now includes publishing companies in fifteen different countries. It has been publishing journals in North America in the 1970s, where its local division, Hogrefe Publishing Corp., was originally based in Toronto, Canada. Its North American division headquarters was relocated to the United States in the late 1980s, where it is now based in Boston, Massachusetts. ==References== ==External links== * (United States) * (International) Category:Publishing companies established in 1949 Category:1949 establishments in Germany Category:Academic publishing companies
